comment.text: This translation key "UpgradePlan" is used to describe an upgrade plan option in a UI dialogue. It appears as a button label and prompts the user to initiate an upgrade process.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "قم بالترقية إلى خطة جديدة" (qim bil-tarqiyyah ila khuttah jadeedah) is a literal translation of "Upgrade plan". While understandable, it's not the most natural or common phrasing in Saudi Arabic for describing a plan upgrade. It sounds a bit formal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "ترقية الخطة" (tarqiyat al-khuttah) which is a more concise and common way to express 'plan upgrade' or "تحديث الخطة" (tahdeeth al-khuttah) which conveys 'plan update'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation "Planı yeniləyin" translates to "Update the plan" rather than "Upgrade plan". While similar, "upgrade" implies a move to a higher tier or level, which "update" doesn't necessarily convey.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Planı yüksəldin" (Upgrade the plan), "Premium plana keçid edin" (Switch to the premium plan), or "Təkmil plan" (Advanced plan), depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Надграждане на абонамента' is understandable, a more accurate and natural translation of 'Upgrade plan' would be 'Подобрен план' or 'Обновен план'. 'Надграждане' implies a technical upgrade, which might not be the intended meaning.
The translation "Plan upgraden" is not a natural or grammatically correct way to say "Upgrade plan" in German. "Upgraden" is an Anglicism and sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate and natural translation would be "Abonnement aktualisieren" or "Abo upgraden" (using the colloquial 'Abo' for subscription).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a verb-first structure which might not be standard in all contexts. While acceptable, it deviates from a typical noun-first construction for titles/labels.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to a noun-first structure if appropriate for the context (e.g., "Plan-Upgrade").

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Päivitä ohjelma' is grammatically correct, it's a more literal translation of 'Update program'. 'Upgrade plan' implies a move to a higher tier or package, which 'Päivitä ohjelma' doesn't fully convey. A better translation would capture the concept of an upgrade.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Tilaa päivitys' (Order an upgrade) or 'Päivitä tilaus' (Upgrade subscription) depending on the context. If 'program' refers to a software plan, 'Tilaa parempi ohjelma' (Order a better program) could also work.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Aumentar o plano" is understandable, a more natural and commonly used translation for "Upgrade plan" in Portuguese would be "Atualizar o plano" or "Melhorar o plano". "Aumentar" implies increasing the size or quantity, rather than upgrading the features or level.

The translation 'සැලසුම උත්ශ්‍රේණි කරන්න' is a literal translation of 'Upgrade plan' but doesn't convey the meaning naturally in Sinhala. It translates to 'To upgrade the plan'. A more idiomatic translation would be something like 'වැඩසිටුවන ලද සැලසුම' (Waedasetuwenwa selesuma) - 'Enhanced plan' or 'නගවාදියුණු වැඩසිටුවීම' (Nagawadiyaenu Waedasetuwa) - 'Upgraded work/plan'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නගවාදියුණු වැඩසිටුවීම (Nagawadiyaenu Waedasetuwa) orවැඩසිටුවන ලද සැලසුම (Waedasetuwenwa selesuma)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Aktualizovať plán' is understandable, 'Upgrade plan' often implies a more significant enhancement or new features beyond just an update. A more accurate translation might consider alternatives like 'Vylepšený plán' or 'Prémiový plán', depending on the specific meaning of 'Upgrade'. 'Aktualizovať' is more akin to 'Update'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Vylepšený plán' or 'Prémiový plán' depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "План надоградње" is not the most natural or common translation for "Upgrade plan". While technically correct, a better translation would be "План за унапређење" or "Надградни план". "Надоградње" is less frequently used in this context.

The translation "Підвищити план" while technically meaning 'upgrade plan', sounds unnatural and awkward in Ukrainian. A more idiomatic translation would be something like "Оновити план" or "Перейти на вищий план".

“升级版本” (shēngjí bǎnběn) generally translates to 'upgrade version' or 'new version', not directly 'upgrade plan'. While 'upgrade' is implied, it doesn't convey the full meaning of 'upgrade plan' which implies a structured plan for upgrading.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "升级方案" (shēngjí fāng'àn - upgrade plan/scheme), "升级计划" (shēngjí jìhuà - upgrade plan/schedule) or "升级套餐" (shēngjí tàocān - upgrade package) depending on the specific context.
